title: Help Finding Sources for Research Paper
description: A student is struggling to find peer-reviewed articles for a research paper and asks a librarian for help.

tasks.description: Discuss the student's research topic to understand their needs and identify keywords.
tasks.expected_outcome: Librarian helps the student refine their topic and choose effective search terms.

tasks.description: Introduce the student to the most relevant academic databases for their subject area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Librarian recommends specific databases like 'PubMed' for a biology paper.

tasks.description: Demonstrate advanced search techniques within a database to help the student narrow their results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Librarian shows the student how to use Boolean operators and filters, leading to more relevant results.
